reference_summary:
Pet Silk Top Knot Gel (4 Ounce) - Pet Hair Gel for Taming Frizzy Hair & Controlling Flyaways – Dog Anti-Static Lotion Cream with Floral Fragrance – Eliminates Static Charges PET SILK {'Brand': 'PET SILK', 'Scent': 'Floral', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Cream,Gel', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 2.56 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '844854', 'UPC': '872429001513', 'Manufacturer': 'Pet Silk'} This stuff is amazing! I didn't even know such a product existed and was excited to try it when I found it. My baby shih tzu has a top knot that's in the awkward stage where most will stay in a band or clip but the lower pieces fall down into her eyes.

I applied a bit of this and all the hair is staying put, LOVE THIS SO MICH! This tub will probably last me awhile but when it's gone I will be back to buy more. Keeps puppy and dog fly-away hairs firmly in their bands ELEVEN EVER Electric Nail Drill, Professional Portable Nail File Drill Grinder Manicure Pedicure Tools for Polishing, Sanding, Removing Gel and Acrylic Nails (silver) … (silver) (ND-02black) ELEVEN EVER {'Brand': 'ELEVEN EVER', 'Material': 'Aluminum', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '30000 RPM', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.17 x 6.22 x 2.91 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '722943850534'} Nice nail kit, very thorough on the selection of accessories. Works great. Lots of accessories
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Pet Care Enthusiast:** Shows a strong interest in grooming products for pets, particularly for managing hair effectively.
- **Specific Breeds:** Likely owns a shih tzu, indicating a preference for products suited to small, long-haired breeds.
- **Grooming Challenges:** Faces grooming challenges with pets in transitional hair stages, seeking reliable and easy-to-use solutions that enhance manageability.
- **Product Effectiveness:** Values high-performance products that specifically address grooming needs, such as controlling flyaways and maintaining hairstyles, emphasizing their importance in grooming routines.
- **Fragrance Preference:** Enjoys floral scents, reflecting a desire for pleasant fragrances in pet care products.
- **Buying Behavior:** Demonstrates loyalty to brands that provide satisfactory experiences, influencing future purchasing decisions.
- **Additional Interests:** Recently purchased a nail care kit, indicating an interest in maintaining grooming standards beyond pet care, suggesting a broader appreciation for self-care and grooming tools. The positive review of the product highlights a satisfaction with thoroughness and function, reinforcing their preference for well-equipped grooming solutions.

Overall, the user is a dedicated pet owner prioritizing effective grooming solutions while also showing an interest in comprehensive grooming tools for overall care, reflecting a proactive approach to both pet and personal grooming needs.
